activities: Homejoy Inc. collects data during certain transactions and communications with its customers, including when consumers/users register Homejoy accounts and make Homejoy bookings or otherwise interact with Homejoy services. Customer data may be transferred from EU-based Homejoy supporting bookings, marketing, security, customer and technical support, customer communications, improving Homejoy services, auditing, data analysis, and data storage.
recoursemech: Local EU data protection authorities, as well as Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
